data.name: All Alone with Mannie
data.detailed_description:
You take the role of a child in their bedroom. where an emergency recorded message plays in the middle of the night to warn you that something sinister is coming and to avoid being caught by any means necessary.

The game has a unique mechanic where every time the character blinks, Mannie moves around the room.

You can look under the bed or ceiling to see if Mannie is there.

You can also hide underneath the covers if she enters the room.

Watch your surroundings.





Use flashlight and blankets to defend yourself.









This game was created using the Pixel Game Maker MV engine.

data.short_description: All Alone with Mannie is a difficult, quick reflex, survival horror game where your only allies are a flashlight, and a blanket, but be careful how you blink... It could be your downfall.
